data.name: EMD Performance Materials
data.description: EMD is the performance materials business of Merck KGaA in North America, a world market and technology leader in liquid crystals and pearlescent pigments. EMD produces a broad portfolio of products including groundbreaking liquid crystals and OLED materials for displays, materials for the production of integrated circuits, effect pigments for coatings and color cosmetics, and functional materials for energy solutions. Razor-sharp images in smartphones, laptops, flat-screen TVs and tablet PCs around the world begin with EMD display technologies, while the company’s pearlescent pigments add shimmer to car paint, sparkle to lipstick and luminescence to coatings for packaging.

data.name: RonaCare
data.description:
To continue leading the industry with powerful beauty innovations, we constantly
explore the scientific possibilities and benefits of skin care actives. Each
active ingredient is part of an overall concept of all-round, targeted care.
Whether for skin, oral, or hair care, the RonaCare® portfolio is
brimming with innovative products that can make formulations stand out with
truly impressive product claims.

Our RonaCare® products offer unparalleled benefits:

Safe ingredients conforming to the highest quality and regulatory requirements
Highly innovative, trend-oriented cosmetic solutions based on cutting-edge R&D
Pure natural biomimetic actives which teach us about holistic and, sustainable skin and natural care.

data.name: Oxynex
data.description: How can you formulate high-quality, consistent products for your consumers and extend the shelf life of the fats and oils you use? The answer: Oxynex® formulation stabilizers. Chemical deterioration caused by oxygen and resulting fatty peroxides can destroy your cosmetic products. Oxynex® helps to ensure the stability of your cosmetics by protecting them from pro-oxida-tive factors such as light, increase in temperature, metal traces, and more. Free radicals at the source of autoxidation chain reactions are inactivated by the intervention of anti-oxidants. Chemical deterioration is an auto-oxidative process caused by action of oxygen in air and can lead to rancidity. Adding antioxidants to your formulations will inhibit the auto-oxidation process, helping to stabilize and protect your formulations.

data.name: Eusolex
data.description: Stay ahead of the speedy sunscreen market with innovative Eusolex® portfolio. Your formulation needs are supported with the most extensive range of approved organic and inorganic UV filters worldwide. Enjoy your time in the sun! Organic Eusolex® UVA and UVB filters are essential components for formulating powerful protection from the sun. Their mechanism of action is based on a unique technology: The organic filters are sol-gel coated in Eusolex® UV-Pearls® and do not come in contact with sensitive skin, but provide optimal protection at the skin’s surface. Adding Eusolex® to applications such as traditional sunscreens, decorative cosmetics and moisturizers creates an optimal filter combination.

data.name: RonaFlair
data.description:
Our RonaFlair® portfolio uses highly-engineered raw materials that not only wear comfortably, but also add a luxurious finish to both skin and cosmetic products. Modern cosmetics have to meet high expectations. Where some want an absolutely matte finish, others are after the ultimate dewy complexion. Some might not be too fussed about radiance, but just want products that wear well and feel comfortable on their skin. Whatever you want your products to offer, we have the secret ingredient that will support your claims: RonaFlair® functional fillers.

These dynamic, functional fillers offer:

Visual skin perfection
Small-sized and multitalented ingredients
Outstanding and easy-to-use formulations

data.name: Timiron
data.description: Our Timiron® line of silverwhite and interference pigments adds sophistication to virtually any formulation. The versatile pigments add an extra dimension of pearlescence to cosmetics or personal care products. The majority of our Timiron® silverwhite pigments is characterized by variable titanium dioxide layers on natural or synthetic mica or aluminum oxide platelets. Our silverwhite pigments vary in particle size distribution, ranging from 1 – 15 μm (Timiron® Supersilk MP-1005) to 20 – 180 μm (Timiron® Ice Crystal). Depending on their particle size and pigment composition, they display different silverwhite lustrous effects ranging from subtle to satiny, pearly, metallic, or even sparkly.

data.name: Ronastar
data.description: Ronastar® high-performance pigments upgrade your products to an unrivaled level. They show up with superior performance such as extremely high chroma, luminous matte effects or crystal-clear sparkle. The majority of Ronastar® pigments display exceptional sparkle, some of which appear even larger than their actual particle size. Others reveal attractive crystal-clear sparkle on small particle scale. Selected pigments impart an extremely smooth and soft feel on the skin and also provide long-lasting properties and effect. Ronastar® even unites deep mystic black with a unique glossy shine and excellent coverage in one intense effect pigment.

data.name: IR3535
data.description:
IR3535® repellent wasn’t just made for nature, it was inspired by it! In a claim approved by the EPA: “IR3535® is inspired from a naturally occurring amino acid” ß-alanine, which enables the repellent ingredient to boast a fantastic safety record.

In the US, it’s rated as a biopesticide that’s approved for all ages, so it can be used for protecting even small children. In the EU, the evaluation of the ingredient did not set an age restriction, and the WHO classified IR3535® repellent as Class U, which means “unlikely to present acute hazard in normal use (WHO 2004)”. The clear, odorless liquid can be used in lightweight formulations like lotions, sprays, and aerosols, allowing consumers’ skin to breathe easy.

Insect Repellents with IR3535® effectively keep pests like mosquitoes and ticks at bay, lessening the exposure to insect-borne diseases like Zika.

data.name: Colorona
data.description:
Pearlescence plus absorption equals color! Colorona® color luster pigments add not just color, but ready-to-use, intense, vivid color and shine.
The shades of the Colorona® pigments are particularly intense, combining deep absorption color and interference effect all in one. The combination of pearl luster and color in one effect pigment results in a significantly more brilliant color effect than a simple mixture of the two components.

data.name: Xirona
data.description: The Xirona® color travel pigments shift in color depending on the viewing angle. Each pigment transitions through a specific set of colors, and our line offers hues that cover the entire color spectrum. Xirona® color travel pigments display a range of colors depending on how you look at them. The stability of some intense pigments is so extraordinary that the formulation of softer and stable color shades is currently unparalleled.

data.name: Oxynex® ST
data.description: Oxynex® ST Liquid is a unique stabilizer for light sensitive ingredients. The active substance in Oxynex® ST Liquid is Diethylhexyl Syringylidene Malonate (DESM). The DESM in Oxynex® ST Liquid provides highly effective stabilization of colorants, fragrances, antioxidants and UV filters. Some applications for this product include skin care, sun care, hair care and decorative cosmetics.

data.name: RonaCare® Nicotinamide
data.description: RonaCare® Nicotinamide is used as an anti-cellulite agent. Today, everyone knows that due to their protective and regenerative forces, vitamins are among essential ingredients contained in cosmetics.

data.name: Eusolex® T-AVO
data.description: Eusolex® T-AVO inorganic UV filter is a fine, white powdered titanium dioxide silica. It is amphiphilic rutile type titanium dioxide allowing the formulation of high-end UVB and UVA sunscreens. A special silica coating provides increased compatibility and synergy with avobenzone/BMDBM. Suggested applications for this product are sun care, sun protection formulations for children and infants, sun care for sensitive and fair skin, daily skin care products and make-up and foundation creams with sun protection.

data.name: Eusolex® OCR
data.description: Eusolex® OCR organic UV filter is Octocrylene, a clear, viscous yellow liquid. Eusolex® OCR is oil soluble with excellent dissolving properties for solid organic UV filters. It is also a photostabilizer with brilliant photo stability. Eusolex® OCR is for use in any application including traditional sunscreens, daily moisturizers, and color cosmetics.

data.name: RonaCare® AP
data.description: Highly effective and pure ingredients to create attractive formulations. Supported by science (in vivo and in vitro studies) and extensive documentation. Developed in-line with regulatory affairs. Offered with worldwide cosmetic formulation support.

data.name: RonaCare® Pristine Bright Liquid
data.description: RonaCare® Pristine Bright™ offers an effective new “tool” for flawless, porcelain-like complexion. It lends cosmetics such as BB creams, day and night creams and anti-aging products a brightening effect that gives skin a dazzling glow, youthful radiance and luminous skin tone.

data.name: RonaCare® Bronzyl
data.description: RonaCare® Bronzyl™ helps enable tanning with a natural and even skin tone. The extremely pure active ingredient is a multitalent – it can be incorporated into a wide variety of cosmetics such as day and night creams, body care, as well as pre- and after-sun care products.

data.name: RonaCare® CPC

summary.name: Synonyms
items: 1-Cetylpyridinium Chloride, 1-palmitylpyridinium chloride, Hexadecylpyridinium Chloride, N-Cetylpyridinium Chloride, N-Hexadecylpyridinium Chloride

data.description: RonaCare® CPC has an active ingredient of cetylpyridinium chloride, a cationic wetting and/ or surface-active agent, similar to soap. It can be used in oral care, hair care, and skin care products.

data.name: RonaFlair® White Sapphire
data.description: Ronaflair® White Sapphire is a white Powder. Our functional fillers improve the skin feel, wear properties and the application features of your finished product. E.g. RonaFlair® LDP and RonaFlair® M-Sphere add value to your products by instant wrinkle hiding and texture improvements.

data.seo_description: EMD is the performance materials business of Merck KGaA in North America, a world market and technology leader in liquid crystals and pearlescent pigments. EMD produces a broad portfolio of products i

data.name: Holographic Stick
data.description: Highlighter goes galactic in a hyper lavender hue that complements your skin tone. Loaded with mineral powder the color and twilight pearls. The color is created by a combination of Timiron® Splendid Blue, Timiron® SynBeam Red and Timiron® SynBeam Violet. RonaFlair® White Sapphire improves the spreadability and RonaFlair® Soft Sphere provides a smooth application. This high pigmented vegan product leaves a sheen as mesmerizing as it is nourishing your skin.

data.name: Ocean'S 13 Mineral Cream
data.description:
Being well protected in the sun and promoting an even appearing skin tone at the same time? Imagine a high-SPF, broad spectrum all mineral sunscreen formulation with an elegant application on skin and phenomenal transparency. 

That is possible with a well-balanced combination of UV filters providing a first line of defense from sun damage and a blend of powerful antioxidants as a second line of defense. Beyond the first and second lines of defense, RonaFlair® LDP White provides instant visual color correction, enhanced sensory impact, and a soft-focus effect that reduces the appearance of fine lines and uneven skin texture.

data.name: Mosquito Repellent with UV Protection
data.description: There is growing concern about mosquito borne diseases including Dengue fever and ZIKA virus spread to people by daytime biting mosquitoes, i.e. the Asian tiger mosquito. Lyme disease is transmitted from tick bites, typically during daylight hours as well. With this formulation, the protection from mosquito bites and ticks provided by * IR3535® is complemented with the balanced UV protection of ** Eusolex® T-AVO – to fully enjoy daily outdoor activities. IR3535® offers long term highly efficient protection from mosquito and tick bites, and is most gentle to very sensitive skin of infants and elderly people. IR3535® is suitable for use in pregnant women. Eusolex® T-AVO is an efficient broad spectrum mineral UV filter offering balanced UVA/B protection. Designed with a specific silica coating that allows a versatile use in the oil and/ or water phase to create efficient and elegant formulations.

data.name: Velvet Lip Lacquer - Cotton Candy
data.description: The intense metallic pink color of the Velvet Lip Lacquer is created by combining an organic color dispersion with two pearlescent pigments and one pigment dispersion. The addicting pink tone is obtained by tuning the organic color base with Colorona® Carmine Red and Timiron® Snowflake MP-99. Timiron® Snowflake MP-99 also adds a good amount of sparkle. The mirror-like silver effect is achieved by Timiron® Liquid Silver. Enjoy this eccentric Velvet Lip Lacquer for beautiful lips!

data.name: SM-03-05 Sprayable Sunscreen Lotion with High SPF (O/W)
data.description: A sm-03-05 sprayable sunscreen lotion formulation from EMD Performance Materials featuring Eusolex® 2292 Antioxidant And Photostabilizer, Eusolex® 232 Antioxidant And Photostabilizer, Eusolex® 9020 Antioxidant And Photostabilizer, Eusolex® HMS Antioxidant And Photostabilizer, Eusolex® OCR Antioxidant And Photostabilizer, Eusolex® OS Antioxidant And Photostabilizer, Eusolex® T-AQUA Antioxidant And Photostabilizer, Eusolex® T-OLEO Antioxidant And Photostabilizer.

data.name: Eus-12-60 Sunscreen Spray-Lotion (O/W)
data.description: A sunscreen spray-lotion (o/w) formulation from EMD Performance Materials featuring Eusolex® 2292 Antioxidant And Photostabilizer, Eusolex® 4360 Antioxidant And Photostabilizer, Eusolex® T-2000 Antioxidant And Photostabilizer, Eusolex® T-AQUA Antioxidant And Photostabilizer.

data.name: Anti Ageing Sunmilk "Latte Macchiato" #MDA-S-09-03
data.description: An anti ageing sunmilk formulation from EMD Performance Materials featuring RonaCare® AP Skin Conditioner, RonaCare® Ectoin Skin Firming And Conditioning Agent.

data.name: Mousse Foundation Soft Luminosity
data.description: The skin-toned shade of this very soft and irresistible Mousse Foundation is created by a combination of Ronastar® Red Allure and Colorona® Imperial Citrine supported by a treated titanium dioxide and a treated yellow iron oxide. With its mattifying and light diffusing properties RonaFlair® Flawless is the ideal functional filler to support the special features of this formulation. The mousse can be applied and spread easily with fingertips for a smooth finishing.

data.name: Self-Tanning Gel with DHA Plus
data.description: Modulate your skin tone in a gentle way with this light self-tanning gel featuring DHA Plus - the olfactory optimized self-tanning agent. Rely on the safe power of Dihydroxyacetone with a noticeably improved odor in formulation and on skin. For a nice glow at any time of the year!

data.name: Caviar4Skin
data.description: The nice sandy beige color of this exclusive skin treatment is created by the combination of Timiron® Super Silver Fine, Colorona® Oriental Beige, Xirona® Moonlight Sparks, Colorona® Bright Gold and Colorona® Mica Black. This innovative formulation for the face can be used as a moisturizer. A suitable dispenser is necessary to obtain a uniform pearlescent gel, which can be applied easily on the skin.

data.name: An Attractive Glow for Demanding Skin
data.description:
An attractive care also for oily and acne prone skin represents a demand not only for the younger generations. Also mature skin will appreciate a cosmetic formulation offering simultaneous redness reduction and a lasting positive impact on skin microflora and oiliness of skin. Our Anti-redness cream gel offers the solutions sensitive skin is longing for.

An immediate visible redness and shine reduction due the use of the Functional Fillers RonaFlair® Balance Green and RonaFlair® Soft Sphere is realized. Both fillers illuminate the beauty of your skin and hide away unattractive imperfections. 

The long lasting efficacy is based on RonaCare® SereneShield and RonaCare® Ectoin. With RonaCare® SereneShield a superior skin conditioning support for less oily skin appearance is possible – a healthy looking skin will attract everyone’s attention. 

This effect is backed up due to the presence of RonaCare® Ectoin – a natural solution to enforce skin own self-protection mechanisms.

data.name: Eye N' Blush Color
data.description: The beautiful mauve shade of this Eye n´ Blush Color is created by a combination of Colorona® SynBerry Pink, Colorona® Dark Blue and RonaFlair® Extender W. Timiron® Super Red brings a little reddish undertone to the color. The addition of RonaFlair® SynMica M improves the pay-off and causes a velvety skin feeling. Oxynex® ST Liquid improves the light stability of the carmine coated Colorona® SynBerry Pink. The powder can be applied at eyes and cheeks with an appropriate brush, if you like the color more intense on eyelid take a wet sponge instead.

data.name: High SPF Sunscreen Fluid with Advanced Light Protection (Broad Spectrum)
data.description:
Give even the most demanding skin its complete sun protection. Protection against UVA, UVB, visible light and infrared rays is realized with a photostable combination of properly selected UV filters and intelligent antioxidant to neutralize free radicals generated by sun light.

Product highlights:

Eusolex® T-AVO - High performing silica-coated broad spectrum mineral UV filter offering balanced UVA/B protection as well as excellent first defense line protection against visible and near IR light.
RonaCare® AP - Effectively shields skin against ROS and free radicals induced by UV, VIS and IR radiations for a second defense line.
RonaFlair® LDP White - Provides outstanding soft focus effect to blur out wrinkles and imperfections on skin while giving the formulation a powderier feel. The synergistic effect of this spherical functional filler and the organic UV filters supports the well balanced high SPF.

data.name: High SPF Sunscreen Fluid with Advanced Light Protection (Mineral Sunscreen)
data.description:
Give even the most demanding skin its complete sun protection. Protection against UVA, UVB, visible light and infrared rays is realized with a photostable combination of properly selected UV filters and intelligent antioxidant to neutralize free radicals generated by sun light.

Product highlights:

Eusolex® T-AVO - High performing silica-coated broad spectrum mineral UV filter offering balanced UVA/B protection as well as excellent first defense line protection against visible and near IR light.
RonaCare® AP - Effectively shields skin against ROS and free radicals induced by UV, VIS and IR radiations for a second defense line.
RonaFlair® LDP White - Provides outstanding soft focus effect to blur out wrinkles and imperfections on skin while giving the formulation a powderier feel. The synergistic effect of this spherical functional filler and the organic UV filters supports the well balanced high SPF.

data.name: Delicate Fairness Gel
data.description:
Want to enhance skin complexion, even out skin tone, impart a natural glow to your skin? Have a look at this thoroughly designed Fairness cream gel and enjoy!

Key natural ingredients:

Emblica® (Phyllanthus emblica) is a natural extract out of the amla fruit, a popular ingredient in Ayurveda. It offers a natural option to a fairer, brighter complexion thanks to its ability to regulate melanin production in the skin, reduce age spots and help prevent photoaging and sun damage.
RonaCare® Ecotin acts as natural cell protector and helps to retain the moisture in skin for a soft and supple skin.
RonaCare® Bisabolol represents a natural and sustainable source of Bisabolol for best skin soothing properties.
Further key functional ingredients:

RonaCare® AP is a true multitalented antioxidant with proven anti-seborrheic efficacy and ability to reduce skin inflammation/redness of blemished skin – a must-have for a refined skin complexion
RonaCare® Allantoin supports additional skin soothing features.
RonaFlair® Boroneige SF-3 imparts a brighter and smooth, rich finish to this naturally beige colored beautifying gel. Its soft focus properties provide further immediate skin correcting benefits.

data.name: Blue Sugar Lip Scrub
data.description: Take care of your lips. Do you want to feel it? Yes you will. This scrub does its heavy duty job to soften out your lips with sugar.

data.name: Thirst & Wrinkle Advocate
data.description:
Hydrate and rejuvenate – Simple but effective mist with RonaCare® Cyclopeptide-5 alcoholfree.

Use a mist to enrich your daily skin care routine with a simple and quick upgrade of hydration and rejuvenation options. This aqueous spray fits in each and every handbag and does its job with every pump – it offers thirst quenching ability for skin. 

Containing RonaCare® Ectoin in it as it offers a complete skin protection to enforce skin and to fight against environmental aggressions. Furthermore, this pure splash offers biomimetic-inspired rejuvenation options to reduce the appearance of wrinkle depth while simultaneously sculpting skin – RonaCare® Cyclopeptide-5 alcoholfree. 

Rejuvenation by communication re-establishment is the mission of this liposome based cosmetic cyclic peptide to mimic skin natural processes. It works on demand and with ultimate precision.

Powerful but simple – instant sensation of wellbeing and stress minimization with real-time enforcement of skin – also fitting for demanding or sensitive skin.

data.name: Skin Elixir Turns Black into White
data.description: This facial care product provides a complete transformation. Hidden by the black color active ingredients will provide a noticeable transformation i.e. lightening effect via Emblica® on skin. Black color turns into white skin.

data.name: Anti-Aging Exfoliating Gel-to-Milk Ecocert
data.description:
The brilliant exfoliating gel-to-milk is an original and soft way to exfoliate your skin. This appealing color is created by a mixture of the mass tone pigment Colorona® Majestic Green and Timiron® Artic Silver which adds a silvery/blue interference to the green background color. Take off a portion of the gel, spread it on your face and exfoliate your skin by gently rubbing.

The formulation, which contains a high level of oil phase, will form a protective layer on your skin and the RonaCare® Bisabolol will help your skin feel soothed. RonaCare® Ectoin will moisture and protect your skin while RonaCare® RenouMer will improve the density and smoothness of your skin. Once the scrubbing step is completed, add some water on your face and the gel will turn into a light milky substance, which can then be easily rinsed.

data.name: Anti Wrinkle Face Care
data.description:
Looking for an effective anti-wrinkle product with contouring effect suitable for sensitive skin?

In a placebo-controlled clinical test, the “Anti-wrinkle Face Care” lotion provided a superior remodeling effect, greatly enhanced skin hydration and visibly reduced depth of wrinkles - all parameters were statistically significantly improved compared to placebo!

The secret behind? RonaCare® Cyclopeptide-5 alcoholfree, featuring a small cyclic peptide designed via a bionic approach. This unique peptide works to correct visible signs of aging.

data.name: "Vanilla Pudding" - Refining Primer
data.description:
The combination of spherical functional fillers such as RonaFlair® Flawless and RonaFlair® LDP White in combination with a platelet filler such as RonaFlair® Boroneige® SF-3 provides the perfect homogeneity when the product is applied on skin and gives optimum blurring effect. In addition, it leaves an incredibly powdery after feeling on the skin. The subtle skin tone color is created by Colorona® Oriental Beige.

RonaCare® Nicotinamide contributes with a pore refining effect and evens out blemishes. The formulation is enriched by RonaCare® Ectoin a natural solution to enforce skin own self-protection mechanism, which also mainly contributes to the wellness sensation of this sophisticated cosmetic product.

data.name: Eye Contour Cream
data.description: An eye contour cream formulation from EMD Performance Materials featuring RonaCare® AP Skin Conditioner, RonaCare® Cyclopeptide-5 Soothing Agent, RonaCare® Ectoin Skin Firming And Conditioning Agent, RonaFlair® LDP Texture Improver And Adhesion Promoter, RonaFlair® LDP White Texture Improver And Adhesion Promoter.

data.name: Anti-Radical Natural Day Care (O/W) #MDA-S-40-03
data.description: An anti-radical natural day care formulation from EMD Performance Materials featuring RonaCare® Ectoin Skin Firming And Conditioning Agent, RonaCare® Zinc Oxide Oral Care Ingredient, RonaCare® Zinc Sulfate Oral Care Ingredient.

data.name: Cosmetics That Shape Your Brands US

products.name: EMD Performance Materials Calcium Thioglycolate trihydrate

data.heading: Our curious colleagues use science and technology to improve people’s lives and the environment.

data.name: IR3535
data.html_description:
IR3535® repellent wasn’t just made for nature, it was inspired by it! In a claim approved by the EPA: “IR3535® is inspired from a naturally occurring amino acid” ß-alanine, which enables the repellent ingredient to boast a fantastic safety record.

In the US, it’s rated as a biopesticide that’s approved for all ages, so it can be used for protecting even small children. In the EU, the evaluation of the ingredient did not set an age restriction, and the WHO classified IR3535® repellent as Class U, which means “unlikely to present acute hazard in normal use (WHO 2004)”. The clear, odorless liquid can be used in lightweight formulations like lotions, sprays, and aerosols, allowing consumers’ skin to breathe easy.

Insect Repellents with IR3535® effectively keep pests like mosquitoes and ticks at bay, lessening the exposure to insect-borne diseases like Zika.
data.text_description:

In the US, it’s rated as a biopesticide that’s approved for all ages, so it can be used for protecting even small children. data.seo_description: View all EMD Performance Materials IR3535 products on Knowde.com. Quickly and easily request a quote, get samples, and download data sheets.

data.name: IR3535®
data.description: IR3535® is an insect repellent that has proven, outstanding efficacy and safety. A recent test proved its bug-fighting power by showing that a single application of just 10% IR3535® could provide over 7 hours of protection. In addition to mosquitos, IR3535® works against ticks, lice, and many other pests, even in extreme climates. Odorless, highly stable, and simple to formulate, IR3535® makes your product developing and manufacturing job easy. It can be used in lotions, creams, gels, sprays, roll-ons, and powders. Here’s a tip: for maximum efficacy, use IR3535® in lotion-based products. Studies show lotion repellents significantly outperform sprays, meaning you can make a little IR3535® go a long way.

data.description: Modulate your skin tone in a gentle way with this light self-tanning gel featuring DHA Plus - the olfactory optimized self-tanning agent. Rely on the safe power of Dihydroxyacetone with a noticeably improved odor in formulation and on skin. For a nice glow at any time of the year!

EMD Performance Materials
data.description: EMD is the performance materials business of Merck KGaA in North America, a world market and technology leader in liquid crystals and pearlescent pigments. EMD produces a broad portfolio of products including groundbreaking liquid crystals and OLED materials for displays, materials for the production of integrated circuits, effect pigments for coatings and color cosmetics, and functional materials for energy solutions. Razor-sharp images in smartphones, laptops, flat-screen TVs and tablet PCs around the world begin with EMD display technologies, while the company’s pearlescent pigments add shimmer to car paint, sparkle to lipstick and luminescence to coatings for packaging.

TOOLTIP.TITLE: Why is this important?

PAYWALL.TITLE_1: Get new products to market faster with a free Knowde Marketplace account
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_1: Gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers from 8,000 suppliers. Browse, search, and filter to quickly compare products, find information, request documents, order samples, and get quotes directly from suppliers.
PAYWALL.TITLE_2: The fastest way to find the right raw materials for your products
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_2: Search and filter over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers, access documents and download starter formulations. Interact with over 8,000 suppliers whose representatives are ready to help. Sign up for a free Knowde Marketplace account today.
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_3: Create a free account to gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 products and their documents.
PAYWALL.UNLOCK: UNLOCK {resultsCount, plural, one {1 MORE RESULT} other {# MORE RESULTS}}
